mapper.html:
Hi {{2.`Client First Name`}},

Just following up on my last email. Our next step is booking an onboarding call.

TLDR: Automation services often involve a number of platforms, which can be logistically tricky to manage (2FA, credential sharing, etc).

I usually take care of all of that on a quick onboarding call where we set up the groundwork live on a screenshare in ~20 minutes.

This also gives us a chance to go over timelines, talk about comms/expectations, solve pesky 2FA problems, and answer any last-minute q's.

Do you mind booking a slot here?

Ideally, we'd do this in the next 72 hours or so, but I am cognizant of your schedule. Let me know whenever works best for you (and if you need anything else in the meantime).

Thank you,
Duncan
